name: Guess Anime Character
description:
Guess this anime character. 

With 3 types of characters (protagonist, heroine, antagonist) consisting of 20 characters in each type of character (60 characters in total). 

You can see the clue that will be displayed in each character. 

You can also see the story of the character that you have completed the level. 

complete all levels in each type of character.

;V
